Received: from KSLawdogg@... by csimo01.mx.cs.com (mail_out_v27.10.) id a.90.5f66bcc (3848) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Tue, 20 Jun 2000 19:18:37 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <90.5f66bcc.268155cd@...>
Date: Tue, 20 Jun 2000 19:18:37 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

(RgDaN, you're pitiful.   You don't remember right.  Rampage X, was someone 
who had the guts to stand up to me when I kept beating him down.  Now he's an 
equal.  You, aren't.  You weren't the only one to stand up to me.  NightLions 
and most of her characters.  Dark Airazor.  A ton of others that I defeated.  
The only one who has ever come close to defeating me is BioVenom.  Our fight 
was interrupted by moders like you.  You never fought me.  I told you to go 
to hell because you were a moding twerp.  What has it been?  Maybe a year or 
so, and no imporvement?  More like you've gotten worse.  I butchered weak 
opponents and females for fun or if they were traitors like NightLionos and 
Dark Airazor posing as evil.  They had to die.  But I took on anyone who 
challenged me.  Except people who can't RPG, like you.    We never fought.  
Are you drunk?  Is your memory cleared?  I've reminded people like Ultra 
Optimus of you, and they said "Wasn't he some loser who sucked at simming?".  
Or to that extent.  We never fought.  I would've ended the fight because you 
moded.  
    If you're trying to say I was afraid of "It's the end of the road, 
Unitron." because someone was going to stop me, hella wrong.  I was scared.  
Scared that some idiot like you has seen the TF:TM and is quoting it.  It 
scared and sickened me.  And in truth, over chat rooms, I've won.  No one 
defeated me.  No one killed me.  So, in real truth, I, and all my evil 
allies, WON!
    But this is e-mail RPG, and you're a crappy leader.  And if you reply to 
this with more whining, I'm not going to reply because no one should have to 
read more e-mails from then necessary.
